content: --मुख {%<ab>a.</ab>%} of every kind, complete, unlimited; <ls>Ś. 5. 26.</ls> (--खः {1} an epithet of Śiva. {2} of Brahman; <ls>Ku. 2. 3</ls> (having faces on all sides). {3} the Supreme Being. {4} the soul. {5} a Brāhmaṇa. {6} fire. {7} heaven or Svarga (of Indra). (--खं {1} water. {2} sky.
